title: Trik film three
creator_contributor_role: Eccentric Circle Cinema Workshop, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion pictures - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Study and teaching
description: A film experiment which uses one of the oldest methods of simple animation. The artist draws a series of pictures of a simple set of actions in progression. These are then stacked in the hand and flipped through to form a moving image. Useful for film making classes. Without commentary.
